creditline: Lent by Mrs. John Richard Savage
description: (a) bronze mirror in (b)brown silk bag, (c)lacquer box with characters, (d)brocade bag, (e)lacquer box with butterflies inside lid, Chinese, Tang Dynasty, bronze and lacquer.
dimension: 1st box: diam.x-1/8 in., 2nd box: diam.4-1/8 in., mirror: diam.3-1/8 in.
title: Bronze Mirror
